'''Voice Actors''' ('''VAs'''), also known as '''Voice Artists''' or '''Character Voices''' ('''CVs'''), are people who provide voice talent for characters.

This page lists the voice actors for each character. Most data is available for [[Playable Character]]s, but there is some information for [[NPC]]s and [[Enemies]].

The data is queried from the {{T|Character Infobox}} and {{T|Enemy Infobox}} on each character's page.
